About

Hieu is a full-time lecturer and a devoted dreamer. He used to be a prolific blogger (the-fools.net, gone long ago!), an eccentric street photographer (fridaycafe.com - personal porfolio, viahe.org - a community photography site, both of which are gone recently), a reluctant translator (e.g. Ayn Rand - The fountainhead).

Courses

  • Signals and Systems
  • Digital Signal Processing
  • Digital Communications
  • Fingerprint verification
  • Ultra wideband Communication Systems
